item.title: Version 5.8.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.8.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Calendar Integration: View calendar events directly in your timeline for better schedule awareness
  • Task Creation from Events: Convert calendar events into actionable tasks with a single click
  • Notification Management: See and control calendar notification states directly from the timeline interface

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed trial sync not working properly
  • Resolved menu bar icon not showing issue
  • Fixed top apps and websites not updating on session change
